name: FCPXProject
desc: An object that contains details of a project with the sequence open in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: var sequence: FCPXSequence
items.desc: A sequence that is open in the Final Cut Pro timeline.

items.name: var uid: String
items.desc: An ID that uniquely identifies a Final Cut Pro project.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The Final Cut Pro project name.
